description: It is Christmas Time and people have a different mood. It is a mix of stress and joy. When I think about my clients its rather stress. If you already have financial problems Xmas is usually making things worse for them - because the spirit of Christmas changed: it´s unfortunately no longer about being together with the beloved family but more about gifts, gifts, gifts. Some people even make debts just for this one day. However, I decided myself to do my very best to help some youngster these days. And when I saw my next client I knew that he would be worth it. He had a nice body and a sexy appearance. I was sure that we would find a way how he would eventually be better off and me satisfied to the max. :-)
title: Debt Dandy 118
